name: The Friend on the Phone
description:
We are two Data Science students who worked on this project during the jam. Neither of us have any experience with Arts and Music, and while we have worked with C# and Unity for a while, making a game was a first for both of us.

Everything was made for the Jam only.

Thanks for playing!

Nikkilite - Developer, Art, Sounds & Music
Froggystyle - Developer, Level Design, Art, & Animator
